title: StartUp Conclave 2025
description: Annual flagship event featuring industry leaders, investors, and successful entrepreneurs sharing insights on building sustainable startups.
fullDescription: Join us for our biggest event of the year where we bring together the brightest minds in entrepreneurship. Network with investors, learn from successful founders, and pitch your ideas to a panel of experts.

title: Pitch Perfect Workshop
description: Learn the art of pitching your startup idea to investors with hands-on practice sessions and expert feedback.
fullDescription: Master the fundamentals of creating compelling pitch decks, storytelling techniques, and handling tough investor questions.

title: Founder's Fireside Chat
description: Intimate conversation with successful alumni entrepreneurs discussing their journey, challenges, and lessons learned.
fullDescription: Get inspired by real stories from founders who started their journey right here at UVCE. Ask questions, seek advice, and build connections.

title: Hackathon 2024: Build for Impact
description: 48-hour innovation marathon where teams built solutions for real-world social problems with mentorship from industry experts.
fullDescription: Over 200 participants formed 50 teams to tackle challenges in healthcare, education, and sustainability. Winners received seed funding and incubation support.

title: E-Summit 2024
description: Three-day entrepreneurship summit featuring workshops, panel discussions, startup exhibitions, and networking opportunities.
fullDescription: Our flagship annual event attracted 500+ attendees, 20+ speakers, and showcased 30 student startups. Highlight included keynote from a unicorn founder.

title: Business Model Canvas Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop teaching lean startup methodology and business model development using real case studies.
fullDescription: Participants learned to validate their business ideas systematically using the Business Model Canvas framework with practical exercises.

title: Investor Connect Meetup
description: Exclusive networking event connecting student entrepreneurs with angel investors and venture capitalists.
fullDescription: 15 startups pitched to a panel of 8 investors. 3 teams secured follow-up meetings for potential funding discussions.
